title: Time Management Mastery
headline: Discover the hidden secrets of time management with this free online course. Become more productive, in far less time.
description: In this free online time management course, you will learn how to get years of your life back. This training can help you excel in almost every area of your life because you will learn new ways to be more productive every day, study how to beat one of the biggest ‘time killers’, discover how to consume information more quickly, find time-saving apps, learn the power of focus and much more.
courseDescription:
How do busy and accomplished professionals across all fields manage their time effectively and efficiently? The first part of this free course will focus on defining your goals and productivity levels. You will also discover how your environment affects how well you manage your time and how much you accomplish. Master how to maintain greater focus and goal-directed behaviour, and learn the right way to set short-, medium- and long-term goals. By prioritizing goals, you save yourself a lot of the everyday hassles people typically fall into. When you get to know yourself better, you can amplify your talents and minimize weaknesses, which will help you work at maximum efficiency without wasting time. You will also learn how improving your reading, writing and speaking skills will increase your accomplishments and save time. Go on to see how your outlook and attitude also have a huge impact on how you manage you time. Nothing kills productivity and wastes time like bad habits, so examine this area to see where you can make significant improvements. In addition, you will learn how to keep other people from wasting your time.

The second part of this training focuses on fast, simple and easy tricks for better time management that can make a huge difference. You will also learn the secret of why the people around you have a major impact on your time-management skills. The course will illustrate how to manage the people around you and your employees to get better results. Having a fulfilling personal life and taking good care of yourself are worthy goals. Learn how to balance your work and personal lives so that they do not interfere with each other. You will also discover the things that steal your time on a regular basis and how to reduce or eliminate them. In this section, you will learn a number of techniques and tools to improve your time-management skills and potentially free up hundreds of hours a year.

People say ‘time is money’ and that is true because effective time management can boost both productivity and profits. It is a valuable skill that will give you a sizable advantage over your competition, whatever field you are in. This course has been set up so that anybody, at any level, can learn how to do effective time management in a way that is fast, simple and easy. The goal of this training is to make sure that by the time you finish, you will have the tools, strategies and techniques you need to be an exceptional time-manager. You will be able to balance a career and a personal life, while being more productive in both areas than ever before.
